SUMMARY: Perl module to manipulate and access URI strings
DESCRIPTION: This package contains the URI.pm module with friends. The module implements the URI class. URI objects can be used to access and manipulate the various components that make up these strings.
RDEPENDS_${PN}-ptest:     libtest-needs-perl     perl-module-test-more     perl-module-test     perl-module-utf8     perl-module-extutils-makemaker     perl-module-net-domain     perl-module-encode     perl-module-extutils-mm-unix     perl-module-file-spec-functions     perl-module-perlio 
